thread.section_title: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site | bbg-discount.com
thread.title: Allie Williams
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Allie Williams

author: Allie Williams
title: Allie Williams
text: I purchased Kayla Itsines' BBG bundle for $39.97, 80% off the list price. I clicked the link hoping for the best, and was pleased to discover the discount was still good! I received my bundle immediately through email, but was also immediately given the links to download my items on the confirmation page. The PDFs are high-quality, easy to read and understand, and in full color. You will get exactly what you are told you will get. I am highly satisfied.
